name: HabitatSuitabilityModel
label: VLIZ Habitat Suitability Model
description: This workflow can be used to better understand overall monthly trends of Aphia species and assess the evolution of habitat suitability under different climate scenarios.

parameters.name: aphia_id
parameters.label: AphiaID
parameters.description: Species ID in the World Register of Marine Species' Aphia Database

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.label: Start date
parameters.description: Start date of the period of interest

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.label: End date
parameters.description: End date of the period of interest

parameters.name: copernicus_marine_username
parameters.label: CopernicusMarine username
parameters.description: Username for Copernicus Marine Environment Monitoring Service

parameters.name: copernicus_marine_password
parameters.label: CopernicusMarine password
parameters.description: Password for Copernicus Marine Environment Monitoring Service

outputs.name: hsm_results.zip
outputs.label: Results
outputs.description: Results from the execution of the model
